resources.string: This app needs root to work!
Boot Image patched! You can find it under /sdcard/AndroidImageKitchen/.
The modified boot image has been flashed to your device. Reboot for it to take effect.
Your current boot partition has been backed up! You can find it under /sdcard/AndroidImageKitchen/Backups/.
Click yes to reboot to Recovery and install Android Image Kitchen. Otherwise, choose no. You can reboot to Recovery on your own or reopen this app.
Wrapper App By Zacharee1 on XDA
Android Image Kitchen By osm0sis on XDA
